title: Table 36 - Row 2
clause_text: Sr. No.: 2 | Qty. of LPG in Kg.s: 8000 | Total area requirement for storage shed (sq. m.): 88 | Safety Clearance required all around in Meters: 7.0 | Preferable size of land with parking area of 6 m. wide on front side: 25 m. x 30 m.
